cleaned_text: PROTOCOL Individual Gram Stains Manufactured with traditional formulations used by most laboratories [Description](#tab1) Description - Decolorizer available in two different acetone/isopropanol ratios: 1:4 and 1:1 - Dispenser caps are provided with the 8 oz. and 16 oz. sizes - Gallon-size Iodine is available as traditional diluent/concentrate or as ready-to-use Lugol's A $10.00 service charge will be added when ordering Cat. No. 23-291-473 online.
